text: Ravindra Kumar may refer to: *Ravindra Kumar (editor) (born 1960), editor and managing director of Indian newspaper The Statesman *Ravindra Kumar (mountaineer), Indian summiter of Mount Everest *Ravindra Kumar (political scientist) (born 1959), Indian academic *G. Ravindra Kumar (born 1961), Indian laser physicist
title: Ravindra Kumar
